definition: the act of sucking, draw into the mouth by creating a practical vacuum in the mouth
details:
noun
- the act of sucking
= synonyms: sucking
verb
- draw into the mouth by creating a practical vacuum in the mouth
= example: draw into the mouth by creating a practical vacuum in the mouth
- give suck to
= example: give suck to
= synonyms: nurse, wet-nurse, lactate, breastfeed, suckle, give suck
- take in, also metaphorically
= synonyms: draw
- draw something in by or as if by a vacuum
= example: draw something in by or as if by a vacuum
- provide sexual gratification through oral stimulation
= synonyms: blow
- be inadequate or objectionable
= example: be inadequate or objectionable
- attract by using an inexorable force, inducement, etc.
= example: attract by using an inexorable force, inducement, etc.
= synonyms: suck in
